Saturday Renaissance #0001 - Bransle Pinagay

May 24th, 2014

To hear what this sounds like, I have a MIDI file available here.

To perform this dance, You need a line or a circle of dancers.

Section A:  1  - 4    Double left,
            5         Kick left.
	        6  - 9    Double left,
	        10 - 12   Kick left, right, left.

Section B:  13 - 16   Double left,
            17 - 20   Double right.
			21 - 24   Double left,
			25 - 28   Double right.

Here are the original pages from my 1596 version of Orchesographie:
